Name: Main Entrance: Gateway to the Clouds
Desc: Entrance to the courtyard of a grand estate. The doors are wide open and no lock is installed â€” partly because safety is guaranteed in this realm, partly because of the long rule of the God of Contracts, which has long ensured that Liyue is peaceful and safe enough that people don't have to lock their doors at night.
